body.name: Four Candies Cute Mechanical Pencil Set, 6PCS Pastel Pencils 0.5mm & 0.7mm with 360PCS HB Pencil Leads, 3PCS Erasers and 9PCS Eraser Refills, Aesthetic Mechanical Pencils for Girls Writing

features: 【Exquisite Set】You will get a perfect mechanical pencil set, including 3pcs 0.5mm mechanical pencils, 3pcs 0.7mm mechanical pencils, 3 tubes of 0.5mm lead refills, 3 tubes of 0.7mm pencil lead, 3pcs erasers and 9pcs cap eraser refills.

【Triangular Grip】The triangular grip design of the mechanical pencil can guide the comfortable holding posture and avoid slipping . And the smooth barrel and light weight provides relaxing and efficient writing experience.

【360pcs Upgraded Resin Lead】The pencil lead is made of high-quality resin and graphite which is more strong, durable and smooth. 6 tubes of lead refill, 360pcs in total, enable you to use for a long time.
【Two types of Nibs】The set contains two types of nibs, 0.5mm and 0.7mm, that allows you switch as needed. Cute mechanical pencils are good for writing, painting, drafting, drawing, sketching, etc.

【Lovely Candy Color】This pink mechanical pencil set is specially designed for girls and an ideal gift choice for friends, classmates, family, etc. If you have any dissatisfaction, please contact us, we will give you a satisfactory answer within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Triangular Grip Design The triangular grip design can guide the comfortable holding posture. And the smooth barrel and light weight provides efficient writing experience. Portable Pocket Clip Each cute pencil comes with a pen clip to easily fasten it to a notebook or pocket, easy to carry and prevent loss. Retractable Nib The mechanical pencil is designed with a retractable tip to prevent damage when dropped and to better protect the pencil core from breaking. Built-in Top Eraser Each drafting pencil has a small eraser core built into the pencil top can be erased at any time.

Jelly Erasers Magic Adding a touch of fun to your stationery collection. Meet our set of three delightful jelly erasers. They quickly and efficiently clean up your work. 360PCS 0.5mm & 0.7mm Pencil Lead Large Quantity of Lead Refills With 3 tubes of 0.5mm HB lead refills and 3 tubes of 0.7mm HB lead refills. (same as #2) Upgraded Resin Material The large capacity lead refill lasts a long time, the upgraded resin is not easy to break, the writing color is deep and smooth which is ideal for writing, drafting and sketching. 9 Eraser Refills Handy pack of 9 eraser refills, ready to tackle any mistakes for daily tasks. Simple and effective, they're great for everyday use in school or at the office Easy to Carry and Store Suitable for Outdoor or Out Sketching The exquisite mechanical pencil set comes with a storage case for you to carry and store. Allows you to easily carry this pencil set in your backpack and use it anytime, anywhere, in any setting.

Create Meaningful Moments Pencils Plus Essentials Come with 6pcs mechanical pencils, 6 tubes of lead refills, 3pcs jelly erasers and 9pcs top eraser refills all inside a storage case. Free your imagination Offers smooth and accurate lines, bringing vividness and natural flair to your drawings. Create precise architectural sketches and engineering designs for professional drafting.

Are these mechanical pencils comfortable to hold? Yes, the triangular grip of this pastel mechanical pencil is very comfortable to hold for long periods of writing. Are the big erasers good quality? The erasers are made of high quality material and can easily erase stains without marks and products with less crumbs. Are all the pencil lead refills black? Yes, 6 tubes of lead refills are black, 3 tubes of 0.5mm HB lead refills and 3 tubes of 0.7mm HB lead refills. How many lead refills does it come with in each size? There are 180pcs lead refills for each size. The 0.5mm has 3 tube of 60Pcs HB lead refills. The 0.7mm has 3 tube of 60Pcs HB lead refills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice set
reviews.reviewText: I like that it comes with 3 refill containers for both .5 & .7 pencils. The pastel colors are nice, & the pencils seem to be durably made. The container with the eraser refills is nice, because I can put in in my pencil holder, & it doesn't take up any more space than the pencils. The case also comes with 3 separate erasers, which I'll probably never use. I'm an organizer person, so the case itself is really cool!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and good quality
reviews.reviewText: Really pretty colors and the quality is great. It’s nice having the different size tips. And having the extra lead is great. The case it comes in is reusable .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great pencils, great erasers, no complaints !!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. im not really able to tell the difference between each size but the pencils are overall cute and they write well. the erasers work way better than i thought they would tbh !! theyre not very grippy tho

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely mechanical pencil set
reviews.reviewText: But I like best is the way that it sits on my fingers while I’m writing. I have some serious studying to do and taking notes with these fine leads is very helpful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Office and School
reviews.reviewText: Purchased two, one for me and one for my daughter. The case it comes in is super simple and cute. Clear so you can see the items inside. They write so smoothly and its super light to hold. We both love them. She keeps hers at school and she tells me all the time how all of her friends now ask to borrow them. Great gift idea and great to have at home as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars IT IS DEF WORTH IT!!
reviews.reviewText: obviously I went ahead and decorated my case but this set is amazing. It comes with enough led, big erasers, and mini erasers for the pencils. I love how it fits comfortably in my hand & how it writes. I love how easily the big erasers pick up the markings in literally one swipe. (Idk about the pencil erasers, I don’t normally use them lol) but this set is def worth the price and the delivery was SUPER fast. Also there’s a small example of how the pencil is with a quick Batman doodle lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable, Middle Schooler Loves Them!
reviews.reviewText: Got these as stocking stuffers for my 11yr old and her bff, they love them. The colors are beautiful and the pencils and erasers are great (they love that thee are two sizes of lead). Zero complaints from them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this kit for my daughter and it met beyond her expectations. She likes how the erasers are soft & works so well. She likes how it comes with a case and the multiple mechanical pencils with erasers. She loves how it has refills too. She hasn’t had any bad experience with it. She did mention the cap that covers the eraser is so small that she almost lost it but that’s not a big issue. We bought the is product at the lightening deal so the price was very reasonable.

This is a great set of pencils! They look so cute and aesthetically pleasing and the colors are just amazing! The set or the case basically comes with everything you need! The writing is easy and comfortable with these pencils! The erasers are great and do the job! Everything you need is in one kit and for a great value! Highly recommend!
Todo muy divino, en su estuche. Prácticos en cuanto a uso y almacenamiento. Me encantaron. Los uso mucho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for my wife, she loves it
VERY NICE PENCIL KIT! I LIKE THIS A LOT! WORKS GREAT! THANK YOU
